  • Method Details

    • setShip

      public void setShip(ArrayList<Ship> s)
      This method set the ships for each player
      Parameters:
      s - Arraylist containing un-destroyed ships

    • clearScreen

      public void clearScreen()
      This method will clear terminal screen.

    • printBattleGround

      public void printBattleGround()
      Method to print battleground

    • printBattleGroundFOG

      public void printBattleGroundFOG()
      Method to print partial battleground for enemy.

    • findLength

      private int findLength(int[] co)
      This method will find distance between valid end and start coordinates.
      Parameters:
      co - Array containing start and end coordinates of ship
      Returns:
      Distance between start and end coordinates

    • fits

      private boolean fits(int[] co, boolean horizontal)
      This method will check whether ship is near to any other ship or not
      Parameters:
      co - Array containing start and end coordinates of ship
      horizontal - Boolean describing alignment of ship
      Returns:
      True if ship is not near to any other ship False if ship is near to any other ship

    • convertToNumeric

      private int convertToNumeric(char a)
      This method will return numeric value of alphabet from 0,1,2,...25.
      Parameters:
      a - Vertical coordinate provided by Player
      Returns:
      Number value of a.

    • addInvalidCoordinates

      private void addInvalidCoordinates(int x, int y)
      This method will add all invalid coordinates to HashSet that will become invalid after placing a ship
      Parameters:
      x - Numeric vertical coordinate
      y - Horizontal coordinate

    • fillShip

      private void fillShip(int[] co, int x, boolean horizontal)
      This method will place the ship. This method will be called only after Player has provided valid coordinates for ship with every condition passed
      Parameters:
      co - Coordinates of ship
      x - Position of ship in Arraylist
      horizontal - Boolean describing alignment of ship

    • takeCoordinates

      private int[] takeCoordinates(Ship ship)
      This method will take coordinates from Player and will check range for each coordinate as well. It will also check the alignment od ship as well, horizontal or vertical.
      Parameters:
      ship - The ship whose coordinate has to taken from Player
      Returns:
      int[] coordinate given by Player for ship. If alignment of ship is neither horizontal nor vertical, it will return array of invalid valid coordinates with length 0.
      Throws:
      IncorrectVCoordinate - Custom exception to check range for Horizontal coordinate.
      IncorrectHCoordinate - Custom exception to check range for Vertical coordinate.

    • getMissileCoordinates

      private int[] getMissileCoordinates(String input)
      This method will ask Player for coordinate to shoot missile and will also check for the correct range of it.
      Parameters:
      input - Coordinate provided by Player
      Returns:
      Integer array of coordinate
      Throws:
      IncorrectVCoordinate - Custom exception to check range for Horizontal coordinate.
      IncorrectHCoordinate - Custom exception to check range for Vertical coordinate.

    • checkShip

      private boolean checkShip()
      This method will check if any ship has been destroyed or not, it will also remove them the Arraylist of ships as well.
      Returns:
      True if ship has been destroyed False if no ship has been destroyed

    • fire

      private boolean fire(int[] co)
      This method will fire missile to provided coordinate. It will also update the battleground as well with result.
      Parameters:
      co - Provided coordinate
      Returns:
      True if missile hit a ship, False if missile does not hit ship.

    • shootMissile

      public void shootMissile()
      This method will be called first to start the shooting process for any player. It will call getMissileCoordinates(in[] co) for getting coordinates, fire(int[] co) for shooting missile and checkShip() to check for any destroyed ship. After that it will process the output.

    • assignShips

      public void assignShips()
      This method will assign each ship to battleground It will call different method to check and place ship to right position.

    • getCountOfSink

      public int getCountOfSink()
      This method will return number of destroyed ship in battleground
      Returns:
      number of destroyed ship
